description: rectangular sheet with irregular edges; applied cut-out image of fish right of center with a medallion with "50" over fish's gill; high relief applied tommy gun in LRC; drips of green at top half of sheet with yellow in vertical irregular areas at top edge; red at bottom 1/4 of sheet with some vertical and arcing lines of red; blue in LLC; blue and green foliage-like element below and to left of fish; black and purple splotches overall; received in shadow box frame
medium: Mixed media and collage on handmade paper
title: Red Tommy Gun
